HomePage.title: Hello I'm Kelly!
HomePage.intro: I help to daily inspire a Sunshine State-of-Mind by encouraging self-motivation and a positive mindful lifestyle
HomePage.work: Work with me and spread those good vibes

AboutPage.title: Hey I’m Kelly!
AboutPage.p1: I’m an Italian-American Content Creator here to help inspire and encourage a positive, mindful and wellness-focused lifestyle.
AboutPage.p2: Whether it’s producing engaging UGC for brands or sharing authentic stories that resonate, my goal is to spread good vibes and genuine connection & relationships through my content on Social Media platforms, all by keeping it real, fun & inspiring.✨
AboutPage.p3: I am currently studying affiliate marketing with AI to expand my impact and reach new heights.
AboutPage.p4: My niche includes: Positivity, Personal Growth, Wellness, Mindset, Aesthetic Visuals, … and a dash of Humor.
AboutPage.p5: My passions are Skateboarding, Surfing, Wake, and all Board Sports and Adventurous Activities.
AboutPage.p6: I like to trying new things.
AboutPage.p7: I enjoy exploring new destinations including Hotel experiences and trying out the coolest Beauty products & Clothing finds, especially eco-friendly.
